import {useState} from 'react' const Steps = ({}) => { const [state, setState] = useState({ step: 'one' }) const {step} = state const changeImage = (e) => { console.log(e) } return (
changeImage('one')}>
1
Create an Account
Add your email and password to start.
changeImage('two')}>
2
Choose the C&M
Choose the appropriate marketplace for your product and category
changeImage('three')}>
3
Calculate sales.
Type in the products current sales rank and click calculate sales to get the results!
) } export default Steps
